project.name: soc
project.description: The Gentoo Summer of Code subproject oversees Gentoo's participation in the 2006 Google Summer of Code.

longdescription.p: For the second year running, Google is organising a Summer of Code, funding students to work on open-source projects over the summer. For more details, see the official SoC website.

This year, Gentoo is participating as a mentor organisation. As a result, we hope to see several students working on specific projects with Gentoo over the summer, and hopefully becoming more involved long-term in Gentoo development.

body.p: Here is a list of some of the project ideas:

ul.li: Write a configuration file manager ( etc-update replacement )

body.p: As a student: If you want to work on any of the suggested projects, or have a project idea of your own, you should apply through the Google page -- see the Student FAQ for information. The team is happy to discuss any ideas you may have before you apply to Google; see below for how to find us.

As a dev: If you have an idea for a project, or would like to become a mentor or join the gentoo-soc team, please get in touch by emailing any member of the team, or find us in #gentoo-soc on Freenode.
